tool_description: Clearalist's Email Verification service to improve your email marketing campaign results! Remove invalid email addresses from your list using our email validation system to prevent email bounces and improve your email sending reputation.
name: Clearalist
title: Clearalist

api_list.name: Verify Email
api_list.description: Verify a single email in real-time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clearalist.p.rapidapi.com/public/verify_email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clearalist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://clearalist.p.rapidapi.com/public/verify_email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clearalist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
